articles.author: Thomas George, Josh Pennington
articles.title: Undercover TV researcher who became one of Europe's most wanted found guilty of 'barbaric' torture murder - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Christopher Guest More murdered Brian Waters in front of his children
articles.content:
One of Europes most wanted men has been found guilty of the brutal torture and murder of a dad-of-two on a Cheshire farm.
 Christopher Guest More, an undercover TV researcher, fled the UK two days a… [+4660 chars]
